name: Asthetic YouTube Theme Custom Style
description:
Customizable asthetic wallpaper style for YouTube Page
All coding stuff is mine if anyone wants to use it contact me and please at least give me credit for it, i'll apreciate it.
additional_info:
Contact me for any errors (no email yet)
-please comment any issues
v1.3 we're fixing more bugs, this a testing version so there's some features missing due to the coding
stuff thingy.
You can make your own youtube customizable style out of this extension.
